title: GCF of Terms
text: Find the greatest common factor of all the terms of the polynomial.

title: Factor into Primes
speech: Factor  14 p  and  35  into primes.\n 14 p is equal to, 2 times 7 p, \n 35 is equal to 5 times 7

title: Multiply Common Factors
text: Multiply the terms shared by both expressions.\n$$GCF=7$$

title: Write each Term as a Product using GCF
text: Rewrite $$14p$$ and $$35$$ as products of their GCF, $$7$$.\n$$14p+35$$\n$$7\times2 p+7\times5$$

title: Reverse Distributive Property
text: Use the reverse Distributive Property to factor the expression.\n$$7\left(2p+5\right)$$
